events.name: menuFocus
events.comment: Part of the menu the player is currently interacting with

children.text:
Get correct input method based on the player's device.
This function was made to make debugging easier, since it's possible to change mobileControls during runtime.

children.functionDescription: Get correct input method based on the player's device

children.text: Create new player profile, based on the default profile.
If the player already has a profile, load it.

actions.text: Change input focus to the title screen.

children.text: Set interaction and instruction texts according to the device type.

parameters.text: "[outlineBack=#000000][lineThickness=4]Tap the buttons to perform the desired action"

actions.text: Change input focus to the main menu.

children.text: Do not fade BGM in if sound is off.
Show "Are you sure?" message to confirm the action/

actions.text: Save sound option to player's profile.

children.text: If the player is still on the first level and doesn't have any combo saved, go to the tutorial.
Otherwise, go straight to the game.

actions.text: Change input focus and mode to endless.
Set tapped button state to selected.
Set tapped button as the current menu button selected.

children.text: Perform menu action according to button tapped.
If the user is not on mobile, select first button as the default.
Select menu button to the left.
Select menu button to the right.
